price: 4. y para advertir (de Su castigo) a quienes dicen que Al-lah ha tomado para sí un hijo.
arabic: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wayundhira alladhīna qālū ittakhadha al-lahu waladan
